vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.21;
son of: Benjamin (H1144);
brother of: Bela (H1106A), Becher (H1071), Ashbel (H0788), Gera (H1617), Ehi (H0278), Rosh (H7220), Muppim (H4649), Huppim (H2650H), Ard (H0714), Ahiram (H0297) and Jediael (H3043); also called Nohah at 1Ch.8.2;
Another name of na.a.man (נַעֲמָן "Naaman" H5283)
§ Nohah = "rest"
the 4th son of Benjamin
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
挪哈 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "休息"
便雅憫的第四個兒子 (代上 8:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
挪哈 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "休息"
便雅悯的第四个儿子 (代上 8:2)
